# Love-You Module
Official Love-You module.

## What is Love-You?

Love-You is a website offering an ***NSFW API*** for **free**!

## Exemple GET images

```js
const loveyou = require("loveyou-api");

loveyou.nsfw("ENDPOINT").then(url => console.log(url));
```
